amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to make (or to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel in the Department of Agriculture to make) payments for the storage of cotton under section 1204(g) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 8734(g)) or for the storage of peanuts under section 1307(a) of such Act (7 U.S.C. 8757(a)).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the storage of cotton or peanuts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A039) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Chaffetz.
